text: Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Watashi ga yurusanai naka ni, kare o shinjiru no ka. Hontoni kare wa, anata gata ni majutsu o oshieta anata gata no tomokudearou. Anata gata no ryote to ryoashi o tagaichigai ni setsudan shite, natsumeyashi no kan ni haritsuke ni surudearou. Anata gata wa dochira no chobatsu ga yori genjude, eizoku suru ka kanarazu wakarudearou
